name: Bobbi Jo Valiant
text: Clean, haven't been in there since the remodel and it is so much better. Very bright in there. Good and fast service.

name: Scott Erickson
text:

I get the same pizza every time. Sausage, extra cheese,  pineapple and spinach

name: Dylan Midtling
text: If I could give -5 stars I would. I called late one night and asked how late they were open, the MALE voice taking my order said they could take one more order and did. I even gave the driver a larger tip than I ever would have and told him â€¦More

name: Delores George
text: Rude and obnoxious. Will never attempt to go there again. Was awaiting for someone to meet us there owner/manager pulled-in in a tan chevy pick-up truck demanding us to leave and called the cops and ruined a 15 year old bday party. Mind you â€¦More

name: Kris Poppler
text: Ordered for pick up and drove 45 minutes for a large pan meat lovers and got a pepperoni.   Check your boxes before you leave! Rude when called and it was their mess up

name: Breanna Bellrichard
text: The best pizza and wings EVER!!!  We will drive over an hour to get food from here :)

name: Janis Roberts
text: This place was the best. Pizza tasted GREAT! Service was phenomenal. They took such good care of us.

name: James Gransee
text: Terrible customer service today, we will not be patronizing them again.

name: Angel Becker
text: Ok pizza. One of them was burnt. Can't say about staff, I drove up to get it, they only offered curbside.

name: Justin Holtberg
text: I was very happy with them last summer, but since then I have found a hair in my pizza and ordered a pzone tonight and it looked like I could have made it but it probably would have tasted better, and the marinara sauce was sweet and gross. Very disappointed and will not be returning for some time.

name: Mel Schwartz
text: Cold pizza and cold breadsticks

name: Laura Puckett
text: This place is a family favorite! The new remodel is fabulous. The staff is friendly and it looks like they are having a great time.

name: Zach Remmel
text: Never has a delivery driver during the day. Website and all other sites show they have delivery during the day. I have tried multiple times buts always the same excuse. Either say you don't have delivery or get another driver.

name: Christopher Quillen
text: New ownership, website told us 20 mi. For pickup, ended up waiting another 30 min. (Probally didn't even make our pizza yet). Pizza was not worth the hour wait. Seemed under cooked. Couldn't even hold a slice with out it falling apart, crust had no structure.

name: jnrae6 Weseman
text: Great food and staff is very nice. The breadsticks are my favorite. The prices are so affordable.

name: Misty Maher
text: Super clean and friendly! And they keep the buffet very full! I believe new owns took over in the last 6 months, so any old bad reviews should really be disregarded I think.

name: Joe Haala
text: fast take out,good service

name: Nova X Satan
text: Great place to eat with great service. Very nice people with great customer service. Seems like they are getting everything back in order. New manager was great person to talk to. Very efficient team.

name: Lacey Chellin
text: Ordered pizza to be ready at 5pm (delivery), drove into store at 6 p.m. to figure out what the problem was (have a birthday party of kids waiting for pizza), took a little bit for the employees to clear the air and admitted it was their â€¦More

name: tony lifestyle
text: Called 3 times stayed on the ringer for 5 minutes  both times last time I called they picked up and was put on hold for 10+ minutes  terrible

name: Ben Around Books
text: So... Sometimes this Pizza hut is on point. Other times, it's like they forget there are people in the dinning area. It's a 50% shot the service will be good. But... The pizza here is always good. I have never had a bad one. If you are in Litchfield, go here and not the pizza ranch. The pizza ranch always has old pizza on their buffet.

name: Haven Weseman
text: They have such good service! When I went in my waitress Hannah was so nice

name: Christina McLeod
text: Wonâ€™t ever spend another penny there!!! They are beyond rude to customers! If you want pizza in Litchfield, MN order from Jimmyâ€™s or Caseyâ€™s!!!

name: Michael Willenburg
text: Do not go here. Terrible service. The owner is great, the rest of them are brats.

name: Susan Keeler
text: Great lunch buffet for a reasonable price. If you don't see the pizza you like, they'll make one.

name: Bobby Snow
text: I canâ€™t believe this place keeps open I picked up my order the pizza was supposed to be thick crust it was thin crust it was so had that you need a chainsaw to cut it and it was burnt  it was trouble how can they keep that dive open

name: Thomas Sands
text: I'm from Willmar and our Pizza Hut closed a few years back but I always enjoyed their pizza that's why when I can make the trip to Litch for pizza hut I will... Their supreme pizza is great because it tastes fresh with the fresh ingredients... Plus they have great deals.

name: Terry Berg
text: Stopped to grab a pizza before going  to the drive in theater.  Pizza was excellent and staff was very friendly.  Will stop again.

name: Abby Shh
text: Love this pizza but great owners nice managers has changed a lot

name: dest and Al
text: They took an hour and half just to deliver my food , and said it would take 35 mins and the employees obviously need some more training and manners . My pizza was all sloppy and cut in weird angles .There just all over the place . Next time ordering jimmys they are always on time

name: Georgia Anders
text: Burnt pizza. Took a long time to get a hold of them to order. Will not order pizza there again.

text: It wasn't bad. However, the pizza could have been more flavorful.

name: Casey Cole
text: Good service. Delivery to Darwin and Litchfield. Tip good

text: A Monday night, one waitress for a 75 percent full restaurant. Took twenty minutes to get pop and to get our pizza ordered. Ridiculous.

text: Spaghetti was cold when first brought to us, heated it up the second time still cold!! Terrible!!

name: A Google User
text: Place an order online or over the phone, don't be surprised to be called back and informed they don't do these specials or carry that product. Even when it says "available in all locations". If it's an hour and a half towards close they â€¦More

name: Joshua Sampson
text: Had great service, place was super busy but staff was very attentive to everyone; including the patrons sitting down to eat and those picking up orders.

name: Naomi G
text: Oh, pizza hut.... how can I start? Well, first of all, the place is dirty. I used the bathroom to wash my hands before the meal and I think I left the place feeling dirtier. So we ordered a stuffed crust pizza, large, supreme. The pizza had â€¦More

name: PrincessAsh95#bruh
text: It's not as much if a buffet as it is 2 carts of very little food

name: Dean Klundt
text: It has good food but took for ever to get it

name: Jordon Nagler
text: It is one of the last sit down pizza huts in the area...they have lunch buffet during the week...the staff was very polite and helpful..all in all it what you would expect from a pizza huts location.. that is all long live and prosper!!!

name: Ben Smith
text: Ordered Pizza, gave them 1.5 hours to get it done. Showed up, still 2 orders to be done before my 5 pizza order. Had to go to Walmart and buy take out. New owners, ok.  But usually new owners make it look good, not bad. Seriously,  you own a RESTAURANT.  Show up and run it.

name: Garrett Isaacson
text: Pizzas seem to be getting smaller.  Maybe I'm just spoiled from giadonnos.

name: Marcie Anderson
text: Just brought my kiddos to supper!  Great service and wonderful pizza! Julie was very patient with us and was very engaging!

name: Julie Evans
text: They have yummy pizza!

name: Blake Barnes
text: Pizza is 3 minutes down the road. Took them 45 minutes to deliver the pizza after I got a text it was out for delivery. Pizza driver is needs to be let go. No customer service skills. Also came to the back door of the house. Not very smart. â€¦More

name: JERRY COSTELLO
text: Clean restraint good food but the service was a little slow being they weren't to busy when we're in there

name: Victor Koglin
text: Pizza was good service was fast

name: Heather Sjoberg
text: Same pizza and pasta on buffet pretty blah.

text: Good tasting hot food. Slow on the delivery- eat in or dine out. Staff was nice. They don't do the large any topping special here.

text: They never put my crust finisher on my pizza.

name: Michael Gallagher
text: Good service , great prices and great pizza. We miss the sit-down Pizza Hut restaurants and were excited to see one still exists. Our experience for lunch was great. We will be back!

text: Bread sticks were especially amazing. Got a deal ordering on line and picking up in store.

name: Nick Koltes
text: Long wait and food didn't come out together so had to wait 15 minutes just so I could eat with my girlfriend since her food was pretty much forgotten about.

name: Jessica Lovell

text: Waited a hour for my food and it was wrong. They took $6 off our bill then assumed that was the tip. Unimpressed.

name: Iron Eagle
text: Why would you deliver a pizza, without parmesan cheese and red pepper you know the little packets.  You think someone would put a few packets in their car, might think of a tip for somebody for thinking, of the customer.

text: Buffet is rather bland...  This location doesn't have salad fixings, as part of the lunch buffet.  Disappointed.   But, it's Puzz Hut...  Can't expect TOO much....

text: Went for lunch a few times... mainly because of coworkers. Pizza was cold and staff was slow to push out some fresh ones during lunch hour. Could have been worse, but this definitely wasn't good.
